TOMCAT_HTTP_BYTES_RECEIVED.description: Total number of bytes received by Tomcat from the start of the process.

TOMCAT_HTTP_BYTES_SENT.description: Total number of bytes sent by Tomcat from the start of the process.

TOMCAT_HTTP_CURRENT_THREAD_BUSY.description: Total Tomcat Http Worker busy threads.

TOMCAT_HTTP_CURRENT_THREAD_COUNT.description: Tomcat Http Worker current thread count.

TOMCAT_HTTP_ERROR_COUNT.description: Total number of errors informed by the Tomcat Http Worker process.

TOMCAT_HTTP_MAX_PROCESSING_TIME.description: Maximum processing time reached for request (ms).

TOMCAT_HTTP_REQUEST_COUNT.description: Total number of requests processed by the Tomcat Http Worker process.

TOMCAT_NON_HEAP_MEMORY_USAGE.description: Tomcat JVM Total memory used in MB.

TOMCAT_MEMPOOL_HEAP_OLD/TENURED_GEN.description: Old/Tenured Gen heap memory pool used percentage

TOMCAT_MEMPOOL_HEAP_EDEN_SPACE.description: Eden Space heap memory pool used percentage

TOMCAT_MEMPOOL_HEAP_SURVIVOR_SPACE.description: Survivor Space heap memory pool used percentage

TOMCAT_MEMPOOL_NONHEAP_CODE_CACHE.description: Code Cache non-heap memory pool used percentage

TOMCAT_MEMPOOL_NONHEAP_METASPACE.description: Metaspace non-heap memory pool used percentage

TOMCAT_MEMPOOL_NONHEAP_PERM_GEN.description: Perm Gen non-heap memory pool used percentage
